name: Toot Toot (Edouard Moinard)
description:
In a post-apocalyptic wasteland you're a car. 

You need to drive and repair using what remains.

Can you make it until the end?

Controls:
  • Left / Right arrows Movement
  • E / Mouse click Pickup items
  • R Repair
  • I Inventory
  • Shift Vehicle's parts durability

Made during the Global Game Jam 2020 at Code Chrysalis

Developed by:

  • Glerek - Lead dev & Project manager
  • Amos (Itch.io) - Art & Level design
  • Kim - Art & Concept art
  • Chen - Game dev
  • Niimi - Game dev
  • Philip - Music
